div.style: width: 100%; display: flex; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: #232323;
color: white; width: max-content; height: min-content; margin: auto;
div.h4: Setup and Installation for Django Backend Project

p.style: margin-left: 30px; background-color: rgb(245, 242, 242); padding: 10px; width: max-content; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgb(0, 0, 0.7); min-width: 300px; text-align: center
margin-left: 30px; background-color: rgb(245, 242, 242); padding: 10px; width: max-content; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgb(0, 0, 0.7); min-width: 300px; text-align: center;
